Package org.catlady.server.game.card

Class CatCard

java.lang.Object
org.catlady.server.game.card.GenericCard
org.catlady.server.game.card.CatCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Card
public class CatCard extends GenericCard
Defines a card that models a cat card, either a normal card or a stray cat card.

    • getCatPowerIfApplicable

      public CatPower getCatPowerIfApplicable()
      Get the power of this cat card if the cat is fed.
      Returns:
      the power associated with the cat
      Throws:
      CatNotFedException - if the cat is not fed but this method is called

    • canGiveFood

      public boolean canGiveFood(FoodType foodType)
      Verify if this cat card can receive a specific type of food in its current state.
      Parameters:
      foodType - the food type to verify.
      Returns:
      true if the cat can receive this food, false otherwise.

    • canRemoveFood

      public boolean canRemoveFood(FoodType foodType)
      Verifiy if this cat card has been fed with a specific type of food.
      Parameters:
      foodType - the food type to verify.
      Returns:
      if the food has been fed to this cat, false otherwise.

    • giveFood

      public void giveFood(FoodType foodType, boolean isWild)
      Provide the cat with 1 unit of a certain food type.
      Parameters:
      foodType - the food type given to the cat
      isWild - true if the food given is a wild food.

    • removeFood

      public FoodType removeFood(FoodType foodType)
      Remove 1 unit of a specific food from this cat card.
      Parameters:
      foodType - the food type to remove.
      Returns:
      the food type removed, can be different from the one requested in case of wild food.

    • isFed

      public boolean isFed()
      Verify if a cat is fully fed or not.
      Returns:
      true if it is fully fed, false otherwise.
